body:
It has been a couple days, and I haven't heard back. For the record, the emails that were sent to the addresses listed in the git commits:

https://gist.github.com/isle2983/1f4bce2eb202553c3e209be5b6606745
https://gist.github.com/isle2983/e84b22121854c56cfe3829f986bcfdf6

If I hear anything, I will post it here ASAP.

The edits to these files are are all 1-liners (7b01ce254cfa0e8ae7e57a72c57e8ae89f3c1829, 873e81f89b3197580aca3dd4a591d00e41696a89, 01cbaeb62fa3c8b046efe6dd1bd2c918f661566a). IANAL, but I think it is fairly reasonable to conclude that there aren't any IP violations contained in those edits.

I will leave it up to the project leads for whether this is appropriate to merge.
